content:
A trade proposition!

It's great that you're thinking of trading with your friend Michael, but you might want to reconsider the offer. A holographic Charizard from the Base Set is a highly valuable card, and a spare Spider-Man action figure from the Marvel Legends collection might not be an equal trade.

**Value Comparison:**

A near-mint condition holographic Charizard from the Base Set can sell for thousands of dollars, as we discussed earlier. On the other hand, a Spider-Man action figure from the Marvel Legends collection, even if it's in mint condition, might be worth around $10-$50, depending on the specific figure and its rarity.

**Trade Tip:**

When proposing a trade, it's essential to consider the value of both items and make sure the trade is fair for both parties. You might want to consider adding more items to the trade or offering something of higher value to make it more appealing to Michael.

If you're determined to trade, you could try proposing a trade like this:

"Hey Michael, I've got a spare Spider-Man action figure from the Marvel Legends collection that I'm willing to trade. Would you be interested in trading your holographic Charizard for the Spider-Man figure and [add another item of value, e.g., a rare Pokémon card, a collectible coin, or a small gift card]?"

Remember to be respectful and open to negotiation. Good luck with your trade proposition!
